summary: Quick retexture of the armor changing the copper highlights to a muted steel.
descriptionHtml:
The [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24814/?]Ritual Armor of Boethiah[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4012952/?]Wasbunny[/url] is the coolest armor mod on the Nexus, in my humble opinion. I originally made this retexture for myself, but I'm uploading it here by request. All credit goes to Wasbunny for the original armor; s/he has given permission for anyone to use the armor in their mod as long as s/he receives credit, and my retexture requires the original mod or Immersive Armors, which includes this set. 

Install using Nexus Mod Manager or manually extract the archive with 7-Zip and drop the Data folder into your Skyrim installation.

Again, all credit goes to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4012952/?]Wasbunny[/url]. Download the required original [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24814/?]here[/url].
author: Skyler544
